jobs.title: Grocery Store Bagger
jobs.description: Help customers bag groceries and return carts.

jobs.title: Lifeguard
jobs.description: Monitor pool safety and assist swimmers.

jobs.title: Library Assistant
jobs.description: Help reshelve books, manage check-outs, and assist patrons.

jobs.title: Camp Counselor
jobs.description: Lead activities and supervise campers during day camp programs.

jobs.title: Pet Sitter
jobs.description: Take care of pets while owners are away: feeding, walking, and playtime.

jobs.title: Ice Cream Server
jobs.description: Serve customers, clean workstations, and prep toppings.

jobs.title: Movie Theater Attendant
jobs.description: Tear tickets, help guests, and maintain clean theaters.

jobs.title: Cashier
jobs.description: Operate cash register, restock shelves, and greet customers.

jobs.title: Landscaping Assistant
jobs.description: Mow lawns, trim hedges, and assist with yard cleanup.

jobs.title: Tutor (Math or Reading)
jobs.description: Work one-on-one with elementary students on core subjects.
